transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, ma'am, mere ko ek cheez puchni thi buyleads ke liye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ma'am, jaise isme option ye aa raha hai ki weekly balance nine leads, yearly balance eight leads. To isme ye kya nine leads jo hai expire ho jayengi?
Executive: Kaunsi wali sir, jo weekly wali aap dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haan, weekly wali ho jayengi expire nine jo aapko dikh rahi hai jo aapne consume nahi kiya. Lekin aaj nahi hoga, wo kal hoga sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Weekly wali expire ho jayengi?
Customer: Haan, dekhiye aapko jo weekly aur aapko jo daily bonus ka jo aapko milta hai na, wo aisa hota hai ki agar daily bonus wali agar aapne daily basis pe consume nahi kari to wo night mein lapse ho jata hai. Aur same as it is agar weekly wala aapko milta hai week mein ek hi bari aapko buyleads, wo agar aapne pure ek hafte mein consume nahi kari to wo bhi Saturday night mein aapki lapse ho jati hai.
Customer: Ye yearly bhi aa rahi hai eight leads.
Executive: Haan, to wo yearly aapko na as a non-lapsable aapko wo mila hoga. Theek hai, wo aapka lapse nahi hoga jab tak aap usko consume nahi karte ho. Matlab wo pure saal aapke paas wo jo eight-nine buyleads aapko jo dikh rahi hai yearly mein wo nahi aapka lapse hoga. Wo as it is rahega jab tak aap usme se buyleads balance use nahi karoge. Wo non-lapsable hota hai yearly wala. Wo as a complimentary milta hai.
Customer: Accha, to ise aaj use karu main weekly?
Executive: Haan, haan, aaj weekly wali aaj kal bhi kar sakte ho aap. Kal bhi aapke paas time hai pure din ka. Wo to night mein lapse hoga na. To kal ka bhi time hai aapke paas abhi consume karne ka weekly wala.
Customer: Samajh gaya.
Executive: [unintelligible] payenge na aapko approval hi nahi milega aapko. Aapka approval nahi hai hamare paas.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible] nahi kar payenge. Sir aap maanga humi aap 40 rupay ki amount maang rahe hain. Aur aapne ye pehle bhi to pay kiya hai na. Pay kiya hai na sir, aisa kuch amount hai nahi aapke paas.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible] nahi hai sir, ye approval hai hi nahi hamare paas. Aap mano agar aap ye cheez maanga humi kara ke de sakte.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: To aap batao sir, mere paas approval hota kya main nahi kara ke deti. Main itne din se aapko mahine bhar se bol rahi sir 40-50 rupay aapke account mein nahi kar pa rahe hain. Iske alawa hum ek rupay kam nahi kar sakte aur aap mujhe apna ek baar register number batayenge sir?
Customer: Wo pichle mahine bhi to maine bataya tha. 7248. Ek rupay kam le sakte hain, ek rupay jyada lenge hum aapse. 72 72
Executive: 7248
Customer: 7248
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: 008337
Executive: Sir aapki voice break ho gayi. Maine 7248 likha hai, ye sahi likha hai? Iske baad bataiye.
Customer: Sorry.
Executive: 008
Executive: Okay, 008.
Executive: Again?
Customer: 43
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir, I think maine number wrong mention kiya hai. 7248008337.
Customer: 427
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: 237
Executive: Accha, 237. Aapki voice bahut jyada hi break ho rahi hai abhi is wajah se. Matlab abhi last jab hamara discussion ho raha tha to sahi tha. But abhi ek hi baar mein aapka voice kaafi break hone laga.
Customer: Haanji. Sir actually aapne shayad customer care wale number pe call kar diya hai, right?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, haan, main main na ek kaam karti hu, main aapko apne side se ek baar call disconnect karke call kar rahi hu kyuki voice aapki bahut jyada break ho rahi hai. Aap mujhe ek second dijiye bas. Theek hai, haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about expiry of weekly, yearly buyleads.

- Customer's voice was breaking during the call.



Resolution:

- Explained weekly buyleads expire every Saturday night.

- Yearly buyleads are non-lapsable until consumed.

- Executive offered to call back due to voice issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will disconnect and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, expiry, weekly, yearly, voice issue
